item.title: A short introduction to the theta function
item.description: The theory of theta function plays an important role in finding exact (quasi-) periodic solutions to the nonlinear PDEs. In this talk, we will introduce first the concepts of Riemannâ€™s theta function (with characteristics) and Jacobiâ€™s theta function. Then some of the simplest properties of those theta functions will be presented. If time permits, we will discuss a little bit about algebraic-geometry methods of constructing exact solution to KP equation.ðŸ˜„
